reviews.text:
Accidentally found this shop, had to have a nosey, very impressed with the store, then decided to get one done.
Was greeted by I believe the owner Stephane who was very informative and friendly.
Very unusual piece of artwork we had to do

Well worth a visit

We found Iris Foto by accident while visiting Barcelona, and it was a highlight of our trip!!  What an incredible and unique experience -- getting to see what your iris really looks like.  Sebastien, one of the founders of the company, worked with us and he was lovely -- very nice and clearly excited about what he does.  Each photograph is a work of art -- and nature -- and we can't wait to have them on our wall!  The photos are stunningly beautiful -- don't miss this!!
